title: go get from tip grabbing weekly goprotobuf
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.  go get -u code.google.com/p/goprotobuf/proto (at current go tip)

Alternatively, you can blow away the goprotobuf dir, and it will still happen

What is the expected output?
Working goprotobuf with latest changes

What do you see instead?
A bunch of compile failures around unsafe that were fixed in
http://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf/source/detail?r=5340ad310031d09a7484cecd00e2520c3a81df71

and the goprotobuf hg identity is:

    be6d136a075a go.weekly.2012-02-07/weekly

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
OS X

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
63ed249fba24 tip

Doing an hg pull -u in the goprotobuf directory and then doing a go install fixes it.
